CustomField.description: Identifies the permissions on the object that are required in order to complete the action. This is purely a hint to identify whether the actions should be displayed to the user on the page. It does not control object permissions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the permissions on the object that are required in order to complete the action. This is purely a hint to identify whether the actions should be displayed to the user on the page. It does not control object permissions.
CustomField.label: Permissions
